metadata.title: Squip Snooze-Nostril Expander, Medium, 1 Ounce
features: Made of soft medical grade silicone
Unlike nasal strips, Snooze is washable and reusable
description: Snooze is used to enhance breathing, improve sleep and reduce snoring - Naturally. Snooze can greatly alleviate discomforts of nasal obstruction or mouth breathing due to sepal deviation or other nasal conditions. Snooze also improves physical activity such as weight lifting, jogging, and yoga exercises by increasing air intake. Free replacement policy.
